metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9872 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The III_dequantize_sample function in layer3.c in mpglib, as used in libmpgdecoder.a in LAME 3.99.5 and other products, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stack-based buffer overflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted audio file.

notes.Note: ratliff> reproducer doesn't crash on zesty (no ASAN) no patch available 2017-06-26

criterions.comment: lame: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
